channel.title: BigLedger - Complete Business Management Platform â€“ Installation
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on BigLedger - Complete Business Management Platform

item.title: Installation of Pricebook Applet
item.description: Please go to Akaun.cloud and find the Applet store. In the Applet store, Please search for the applet that you want to install and click on it. Please click the “Install” button to install the applet. Please click on “akaun” to go back to the Akaun.cloud page to search for the installed applet and click on it.

item.title: Installation of Group Maintenance Applet
item.description: 1.Installation (Akaun Cloud): Applet Store > Search > Install > Akaun page > Search 1.1. Please go to Akaun.cloud and find the Applet store. 1.2. In the Applet store, Please search for the applet that you want to install and click on it. 1.3. Please click the ‘Install’ button to install the applet. 1.4 Please click on ‘akaun’ to go back to the Akaun.cloud page to search for the installed applet and click on it (Same as 1.1).

item.title: Installation of Team Maintenance Applet
item.description: 1.Installation (Akaun Cloud): Applet Store > Search > Install > Akaun page > Search 1.1. Please go to Akaun.cloud and find the Applet store. 1.2. In the Applet store, Please search for the applet that you want to install and click on it. 1.3. Please click the ‘Install’ button to install the applet. 1.4 Please click on ‘akaun’ to go back to the Akaun.cloud page to search for the installed applet and click on it (Same as 1.1).
